name: OverTime (itch) (CesarManriqueGames)
description:
OverTime is a game developed 2019 by Cesar Manrique's students using Unity Engine.

The tasks in the office are never ending, and your collegues and bosses are possesed the only way to get out and return home is get your weapon and clear the office.

Use different weapons in your work and liberate yourself! 

Remember to reload using the "R" key, Jump with the Space, shoot with your left click mouse and move with ASD.

All the game, what means: scripts, weapons, characters and levels are 100% originals and made by students!
